element.definition: The fixture id (maybe new) to map to the response.
element.comments: If a responseId is supplied, and the server responds, then the resulting response (both headers and body) is mapped to the fixture ID (which may be entirely new and previously undeclared) designated by "responseId".  If responseId is not specified, it is the Test Engine's responsibility to store the response and use it as sourceId in subsequent assertions when assertion path and/or headerField is specified and sourceId is not specified.
